abstract.p: List of some recent residential sales in New York City area; photo (S)

block.p: $530,000 55 Liberty Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. condo in a renovated pre-World War II building; 24-hr. doormen; bath with sauna, 9 oversize windows; maintenance $2,042, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $549,000, 26 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$534,000 175 West 13th Street (Cambridge House) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen; 3 exposures; common roof deck in building; maintenance $1,012, 46% tax-deductible; listed at $539,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$530,000 55 Liberty Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. condo in a renovated pre-World War II building; 24-hr. doormen; bath with sauna, 9 oversize windows; maintenance $2,042, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $549,000, 26 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$534,000 175 West 13th Street (Cambridge House) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen; 3 exposures; common roof deck in building; maintenance $1,012, 46% tax-deductible; listed at $539,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$525,000 630 First Avenue (50th Street) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; marble bath, hardwood floors, eastern exposure; gym, pool and roof deck in building; common charge $680; taxes $8,160; listed at $535,000, 12 weeks on market (brokers: Metropolis Real Estate; Corcoran Group)

$580,000 200 Riverside Boulevard (Trump Riverside Boulevard) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 812-sq.-ft. condo in a recently constructed building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; high ceilings, Hudson River view; pool in building; common charge $470; taxes $1,701 (abated), listed at $625,000, 6 weeks on market (brokers: Heron Residential; Douglas Elliman)

$390,000 519 West 135th Street (Manhattan Hill) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,328-sq.-ft. condo in a recently constructed building; dining area, hardwood floors, terrace, washer/dryer in unit; common charge $392; taxes $56 (abated); listed at $390,000 (multiple bids), 8 weeks on market (broker: Manhattan Apartments, Inc.)

$998,000 244 Wyckoff Street 2-family 3-story prewar brick house; 3 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, two fireplaces, two walk-in closets, washer-dryer in primary unit, a duplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath in other unit; original moldings and detail in each; 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,795; listed at $995,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (broker: Nancy McKiernan Realty)

$1.3 million 154 Sixth Avenue 2-family 4-story brownstone; 4 bedrooms, 2 baths, dining room, four marble mantels in primary unit; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen, three marble mantels in other; 13-ft. ceilings, parquet floors, original kitchens in each; 21-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,400; listed at $1.395 million, 26 weeks on market (broker: Brenton Realty)

$617,500 130 East 4th Street 2-family prewar attached brick house; 1 bedroom, eat-in kitchen, two studies in primary unit; 1 bedroom, one study in other; dining room, hardwood floors, 1 bath in each; finished basement, new roof; 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,704; listed at $639,000, 9 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$693,500 322 Mason Boulevard 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 11-year-old ranch-style house; dining area, eat-in kitchen, family room, den, walk-in closet, oak floors; 2-car garage, 80-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,600; listed at $729,900, 4 weeks on market (broker: Sari Kingsley Real Estate)

$870,000 3 Roger Place 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 45-year-old split-level house; eat-in kitchen, living room with fireplace, home office, finished basement, central air-conditioning; rear deck, 2-car garage, in-ground pool on 0.47-acre lot; taxes $12,150; listed at $899,000, 15 weeks on market (brokers: Prudential Rand; Coldwell Banker Real Estate)
